article_title: Police chief: We’re not targeting Eric Sheppard

article_metadata.author:
BY ADAM FLOYD
adam.floyd@gaflnews.com

og.description: VALDOSTA — The chief of police said Friday, “No one wants to hurt Eric Sheppard.”
og.title: Police chief: We’re not targeting Eric Sheppard
